verses.verse: And he shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at his right hand <S%H3225><s%> to resist <S%H7853><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Satan <S%H7854><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, O Satan <S%H7854><s%>; even the YY <S%H3068><s%> that hath chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee: is not this a brand <S%H181><s%> plucked <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8716><s%> out of the fire <S%H784><s%> ?

Now Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> was clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%>.

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto those that stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from him. And unto him he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have caused thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from thee, and I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee with change of raiment <S%H4254><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let them set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> mitre <S%H6797><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>. So they set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> mitre <S%H6797><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with garments <S%H899><s%>. And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> stood by <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; If thou wilt walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in my ways <S%H1870><s%>, and if thou wilt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my charge <S%H4931><s%>, then thou shalt also judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>, and shalt also keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my courts <S%H2691><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee places to walk <S%H4108><s%> <S%H8688><s%> among these that stand by <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, O Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, thou, and thy fellows <S%H7453><s%> that sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: for they are men <S%H582><s%> wondered at <S%H4159><s%>: for, behold, I will bring forth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> the BRANCH <S%H6780><s%>.

For behold the stone <S%H68><s%> that I have laid <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>; upon one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>: behold, I will engrave <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the graving <S%H6603><s%> thereof, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and I will remove <S%H4185><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, shall ye call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%> under the vine <S%H1612><s%> and under the fig tree <S%H8384><s%>.
